law.catch_line: Nonissuance, nonrenewal, revocation, suspension, and probation of licenses.

text.section:
The board may refuse to issue, may revoke, or suspend and impose probationary conditions on the registration of an apprentice, and may issue a written reprimand and impose a fine, for:
Violating any of the provisions set out in paragraphs (a) to (i) of subsection (1) of this section; or
Disobeying the proper orders or instructions of a superior.

The board may refuse to issue or renew, may revoke, or suspend and impose probationary conditions on the license of any funeral establishment, and may issue a written reprimand and impose a fine, for:
Misrepresenting or concealing a material fact in obtaining a funeral establishment license;
Operating a funeral establishment in violation of any lawful order of the board or any state or federal statute or administrative regulation governing the operation of a funeral establishment; or
Operating a funeral establishment without the supervision of a Kentucky-licensed embalmer or a Kentucky-licensed funeral director.
